homepage.body: We provide a quality rental service to everyone. Please feel free to browse  at our properties available. All our properties are located in the downtown region near mcgill university.
homepage.body2: All our apartments come fully furnished with Wifi included. Some utilities are extra please contact us for further details. Note our apartments are not pet friendly and do not allow smoking in them.
